title: The Family Place
description: Led comprehensive marketing transformation for Cache County's premier child abuse recovery nonprofit, establishing standardized brand identity and implementing robust web systems while managing team growth from volunteer to Senior Marketing Specialist.
_imageNote: Images are auto-detected! Place webp files named: the-family-place_1.webp (cover), the-family-place_2.webp (gallery), etc.
metrics: Promoted from Junior to Senior Marketing Specialist within one year
Established standardized brand guide still in use today
Built robust web content management systems
Led team of 5-10 marketing professionals and interns
impact: Transformed nonprofit's marketing capabilities, achieving record fundraising results and establishing lasting brand infrastructure that continues to support their child abuse recovery mission in Cache County
